ygData.subject: Re: A simple thank you
ygData.msgSnippet: ... list ... trips so ... Steamfront ... make ... rat! ... I remember the Plague Rats of Steamfront from my days hunting Clockworks for my Trueshot.  And all
ygData.messageBody:
--- In EverQuest@y..., "Steven R. Hulse" <steve@k...> wrote:
> Hi gang,
> I just wanted to take a moment and thank any and all of you on this
list
> I may have come across during my Warrior's, (Genmay), travels to and
> from Ak'Anon and Felwith. The SOW's were perfect, it makes the
trips so
> much faster! As for the extra buffs those were wonderful too! Lately
> I've had a thing going on with a large plagued rat over in
Steamfront
> who seems to find me every time and kills me! With the buffs I can
make
> it to the gates of the city and the guards take care of him. I swear
> when I get a couple of levels higher I'm going to defeat that darn
rat!
> ;-)
>
> Happy hunting!
> Durgaa: 9th level Wood Elf Ranger
> Shizney: 5th level Gnome Mage
> Genmay: 6th level Gnome Warrior

I remember the Plague Rats of Steamfront from my days hunting
Clockworks for my Trueshot. And all those elementals, Minotaurs and
that Meldrath guy. I'm thinking it's payback time myself!

Revenge is a dish best served on the end of a sword!

Tuldayen Grimblade
39th Season Ranger of Tunare
Terris-Thule
